IRS990.ActivityOrMissionDesc: SHAPE THE CULTURAL IDENTITY OF ALAMANCE COUNTY BY MAKING ART A TANGIBLE PRESENCE IN THE LIVES OF ITS CITIZENS. STRIVE TO ENHANCE THE QUALITY OF LIFE BY ENGAGING PEOPLE IN A DIVERSE ARRAY OF ART THROUGH THE DELIVERY OF PROGRAMMING AND EDUCATION AND THROUGH THE PROVISION OF FACILITIES, PROMOTION AND FUNDING.
IRS990.MissionDesc: SHAPE THE CULTURAL IDENTITY OF ALAMANCE COUNTY BY MAKING ART A TANGIBLE PRESENCE IN THE LIVES OF ITS CITIZENS. STRIVE TO ENHANCE THE QUALITY OF LIFE BY ENGAGING PEOPLE IN A DIVERSE ARRAY OF ART THROUGH THE DELIVERY OF PROGRAMMING AND EDUCATION AND THROUGH THE PROVISION OF FACILITIES, PROMOTION AND FUNDING.
IRS990.Desc: THE COUNCIL PROVIDES PROGRAMS THROUGHOUT THE YEAR AND IN THE COMMUNITY THROUGH ART SHOWS, CONCERTS, ART TRAVEL PROGRAMS, CHILDREN'S ART ACTIVITIES AND OTHER PROGRAMS THAT ENHANCE THE COMMUNITIES KNOWLEDGE AND ENJOYMENT OF VARIOUS ART ACTIVITIES.

ProgSrvcAccomActy2Grp.Desc: ASSOCIATED MEMBER GROUPS THROUGHOUT THE COUNTY PROVIDE A VARIOUS ARRAY OF ART ACTIVITIES ANNUALLY THROUGH ART FESTIVALS,INSTRUMENTAL AND VOCAL CONCERTS AND PLAY PERFORMANCES AND DEVELOPMENT OF WRITING SKILLS THROUGH STUDY, PRACTICE AND AUDITIONS

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: SCHEDULE D, PAGE 2, PART V, LINE 4
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE COUNCIL HAS TWO ENDOWMENT FUNDS. WITH REGARDS TO THE FIRST, 5% OF THE ASSET VALUE AS CALCULATED FROM PRIOR YEAR'S ENDING BALANCE CAN BE WITHDRAWN FOR PURPOSES AS APPROVED BY THE BOARD OF DIRECTORS. THE SECOND FUND WAS ESTABLISHED TO SUPPORT ART PRESENTATIONS WITHIN THE COMMUNITY.

THE INTERNAL REVENUE SERVICE HAS DETERMINED THAT THE COUNCIL IS NOT A PRIVATE FOUNDATION. THE COUNCIL IS CURRENTLY NOT UNDER AN INCOME TAX AUDIT IN ANY JURISDICTION. HOWEVER, DUE TO THE COMPLEXITY INVOLVED WITH CERTAIN TAX MATTERS, THERE IS THE POSSIBILITY THAT THE VARIOUS TAXING AUTHORITIES MAY DISAGREE WITH CERTAIN TAX POSITIONS FILED ON THE COUNCIL'S INCOME TAX RETURNS. ALL RELEVANT FACTS AND CIRCUMSTANCES HAVE BEEN CONSIDERED AND THE COUNCIL BELIEVES THAT IT HAS MADE ADEQUATE PROVISION FOR ALL INCOME TAX UNCERTAINTIES.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: SCHEDULE D, PAGE 4, PART XI, LINE 2D
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: DIRECT FUND RAISING EXPENSES NETTED WITH REVENUE 105,088

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: SCHEDULE D, PAGE 4, PART XI, LINE 4B
SCHEDULE D, PAGE 4, PART XII, LINE 2D
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: DIRECT FUND RAISING EXPENSES NETTED WITH REVENUE 105,088

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: SCHEDULE D, PAGE 4, PART XII, LINE 4B

SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: SCHEDULE G, PAGE 3, PART IV - ADDITIONAL INFORMATION SCHEDULE G, PART III, LINE 9B EXPLANATION: UNDER SECTION 14-309.15 OF THE NORTH CAROLINA GENERAL ASSEMBLY A NONPROFIT ORGANIZATION, RECOGNIZED BY THE DEPARTMENT OF REVENUE AS TAX-EXEMPT, MAY CONDUCT 2 RAFFLES PER YEAR. THE ORGANIZATION PERFORMED 1 RAFFLE DURING THE YEAR WHERE THE CRITERIA OF RAFFLE WAS MET. SCHEDULE G, PART III 16 DESCRIPTION OF SERVICES PROVIDED EVENT WAS ONE REVERSE RAFFLE. THE EXECUTIVE DIRECTOR WAS THERE IN A DIRECTOR CAPACITY REPRESENTING THE COUNCIL. GAMING MANAGEMENT WAS NOT NEEDED.

SHAPE THE CULTURAL IDENTITY OF ALAMANCE COUNTY BY MAKING ART A TANGIBLE PRESENCE IN THE LIVES OF ITS CITIZENS. STRIVE TO ENHANCE THE QUALITY OF LIFE BY ENGAGING PEOPLE IN A DIVERSE ARRAY OF ART THROUGH THE DELIVERY OF PROGRAMMING AND EDUCATION AND THROUGH THE PROVISION OF FACILITIES, PROMOTION AND FUNDING.
FORM 990 WAS MADE AVAILABLE TO THE BOARD MEMBERS.
EXECUTIVE DIRECTOR REVIEWS THE CONFLICT OF INTEREST FORMS AND BY NATURE OF JOB DUTIES STAYS AWARE OF THE VARIOUS PARTIES INVOLVED IN THE ARTS COUNCIL.
FOR ALL EMPLOYEES THE EXECUTIVE COMMITTEE MAKES A RECOMMENDATION TO THE FULL BOARD WHO VOTES AS PART OF THE BUDGET APPROVAL PROCESS.
